title: Chiricahua National Monument: Permits & Reservations
body: Permits & Reservations       Reserve a Campsite at Bonita Canyon Campground Campsites can now be reserved online. Follow the link to more information on the campground, or go directly to www.recreation.gov to reserve your campsite.  Special Use Permits Certain types of activities require a special use permit. These include many types of organized gatherings, distribution of printed material and other public expressions of opinion, and other activities that are controlled or prohibited. See the Special Use Permit section to determine if your use might be included.    Commercial Filming & Photography The National Park Service encourages filming and photography when it will promote the protection and public enjoyment of park resources, provided that the activity does not violate certain regulations set in place by park management. Contact the Special Park Uses Coordinator at  (520) 366-5515 for additional information.
